flawed_nl_solution:
Four of the five figures are worth 4 * 15 = $<<4*15=60>>60.
With one more expensive figure, they are all worth 60 + 20 = $<<60+20=80>>80.
On all action figures, Jimmy will lose 5 * 5 = $<<5*5=52>>52 if he sells them cheaper.
So if Jimmy sells the figures he will get 80 - 52 = $<<80-52=28>>28.
#### 28

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 52. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
